wikipedia_page.main: Kevin McDonald (born 23 January 1981 in Rutherglen) is a Scottish former footballer who played in midfield. His most prominent club was Dundee United, where he returned to work as a community coach after ending his playing career.

response: Kevin McDonald (born 1961) is a Canadian comedian and actor.
Kevin McDonald may also refer to:
*Kevin McDonald (bishop) (born 1947), Roman Catholic Archbishop of Southwark, England
